rows.arabic: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
rows.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
rows.transliteration: bismillāhir raḥmānir raḥīm

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱتَّقُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ زَلْزَلَةَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ شَىْءٌ عَظِيمٌ
rows.translation: O mankind! Fear your Lord. Lo! the earthquake of the Hour (of Doom) is a tremendous thing.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nāsut-taqū rabbakum ۚ inna zalzalatas sā`ati shay-un `aẓīm

rows.arabic: يَوْمَ تَرَوْنَهَا تَذْهَلُ كُلُّ مُرْضِعَةٍ عَمَّآ أَرْضَعَتْ وَتَضَعُ كُلُّ ذَاتِ حَمْلٍ حَمْلَهَا وَتَرَى ٱلنَّاسَ سُكَـٰرَىٰ وَمَا هُم بِسُكَـٰرَىٰ وَلَـٰكِنَّ عَذَابَ ٱللَّهِ شَدِيدٌ
rows.translation: On the day when ye behold it, every nursing mother will forget her nursling and every pregnant one will be delivered of her burden, and thou (Muhammad) wilt see mankind as drunken, yet they will not be drunken, but the Doom of Allah will be strong (upon them).
rows.transliteration: yawma tarawnahā tadh-halu kullu murḍi`atin `ammā arḍa`at wataḍa`u kullu dhāti ḥamlin ḥamlahā wataran nāsa sukārā wa mā hum bisukārā walākinna `adhāballāhi shadīd

rows.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَـٰدِلُ فِى ٱللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ وَيَتَّبِعُ كُلَّ شَيْطَـٰنٍ مَّرِيدٍ
rows.translation: Among mankind is he who disputeth concerning Allah without knowledge, and followeth each froward devil;
rows.transliteration: wa minan nāsi man yujādilu fillāhi bighayri `il-min wayattabi`u kulla shayṭānin marīd

rows.arabic: كُتِبَ عَلَيْهِ أَنَّهُۥ مَن تَوَلَّاهُ فَأَنَّهُۥ يُضِلُّهُۥ وَيَهْدِيهِ إِلَىٰ عَذَابِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
rows.translation: For him it is decreed that whoso taketh him for friend, he verily will mislead him and will guide him to the punishment of the Flame.
rows.transliteration: kutiba `alayhi annahu man tawallāhu fa-annahu yuḍilluhu wayahdīhi ilā `adhābis sa`īr

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِن كُنتُمْ فِى رَيْبٍ مِّنَ ٱلْبَعْثِ فَإِنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰكُم مِّن تُرَابٍ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ ثُمَّ مِنْ عَلَقَةٍ ثُمَّ مِن مُّضْغَةٍ مُّخَلَّقَةٍ وَغَيْرِ مُخَلَّقَةٍ لِّنُبَيِّنَ لَكُمْ ۚ وَنُقِرُّ فِى ٱلْأَرْحَامِ مَا نَشَآءُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ثُمَّ نُخْرِجُكُمْ طِفْلًا ثُمَّ لِتَبْلُغُوٓا۟ أَشُدَّكُمْ ۖ وَمِنكُم مَّن يُتَوَفَّىٰ وَمِنكُم مَّن يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰٓ أَرْذَلِ ٱلْعُمُرِ لِكَيْلَا يَعْلَمَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ عِلْمٍ شَيْـًٔا ۚ وَتَرَى ٱلْأَرْضَ هَامِدَةً فَإِذَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَآءَ ٱهْتَزَّتْ وَرَبَتْ وَأَنۢبَتَتْ مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍۭ بَهِيجٍ
rows.translation: O mankind! if ye are in doubt concerning the Resurrection, then lo! We have created you from dust, then from a drop of seed, then from a clot, then from a little lump of flesh shapely and shapeless, that We may make (it) clear for you. And We cause what We will to remain in the wombs for an appointed time, and afterward We bring you forth as infants, then (give you growth) that ye attain your full strength. And among you there is he who dieth (young), and among you there is he who is brought back to the most abject time of life, so that, after knowledge, he knoweth naught. And thou (Muhammad) seest the earth barren, but when We send down water thereon, it doth thrill and swell and put forth every lovely kind (of growth).
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nāsu in kuntum fī raybin minal ba`thi fa-innā khalaqnākum min turābin thumma min nuṭfatin thumma min `alaqatin thumma min muḍghatim mukhallaqatin waghayri mukhallaqatin linubayyina lakum ۚ wanuqirru fil-arḥāmi mā nashā-u ilā ajalin musamman thumma nukhrijukum ṭiflan thumma litablughū ashuddakum ۖ wa minkum man yutawaffā wa minkum man yuraddu ilā ardhalil `umuri likaylā ya`lama min ba`di `il-min shay-ā ۚ wataral-arḍa hāmidatan fa-idhā anzalnā `alayhal mā-ah-tazzat warabat wa-anbatat min kulli zawjin bahīj

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَأَنَّهُۥ يُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَأَنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
rows.translation: That is because Allah, He is the Truth and because He quickeneth the dead, and because He is Able to do all things;
rows.transliteration: dhālika bi-annallāha huwal ḥaqqu wa-annahu yuḥyil mawtā wa-annahu `alā kulli shay-in qadīr

rows.arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ لَّا رَيْبَ فِيهَا وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبْعَثُ مَن فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ
rows.translation: And because the Hour will come, there is no doubt thereof; and because Allah will raise those who are in the graves.
rows.transliteration: wa-annas sā`ata ātiyatun lā rayba fīhā wa-annallāha yab`athu man fil qubūr

rows.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يُجَـٰدِلُ فِى ٱللَّهِ بِغَيْرِ عِلْمٍ وَلَا هُدًى وَلَا كِتَـٰبٍ مُّنِيرٍ
rows.translation: And among mankind is he who disputeth concerning Allah without knowledge or guidance or a scripture giving light,
rows.transliteration: wa minan nāsi man yujādilu fillāhi bighayri `il-min walā hudan walā kitābin munīr

rows.arabic: ثَانِىَ عِطْفِهِۦ لِيُضِلَّ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَهُۥ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا خِزْىٌ ۖ وَنُذِيقُهُۥ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ عَذَابَ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
rows.translation: Turning away in pride to beguile (men) from the way of Allah. For him in this world is ignominy, and on the Day of Resurrection We make him taste the doom of burning.
rows.transliteration: thāniya `iṭfihi liyuḍilla `an sabīlillāh ۖ lahu fid dunyā khizyun ۖ wanudhīquhu yawmal qiyāmati `adhābal ḥarīq

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاكَ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيْسَ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
rows.translation: (And unto him it will be said): This is for that which thy two hands have sent before, and because Allah is no oppressor of His slaves.
rows.transliteration: dhālika bimā qaddamat yadāka wa-annallāha laysa biẓallāmin lil`abīd

rows.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَعْبُدُ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ حَرْفٍ ۖ فَإِنْ أَصَابَهُۥ خَيْرٌ ٱطْمَأَنَّ بِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنْ أَصَابَتْهُ فِتْنَةٌ ٱنقَلَبَ عَلَىٰ وَجْهِهِۦ خَسِرَ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْخُسْرَانُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
rows.translation: And among mankind is he who worshippeth Allah upon a narrow marge so that if good befalleth him he is content therewith, but if a trial befalleth him, he falleth away utterly. He loseth both the world and the Hereafter. That is the sheer loss.
rows.transliteration: wa minan nāsi man ya`budullāha `alā ḥarf ۖ fa-in aṣābahu khayruni-ma-anna bih ۖ wa in aṣābat-hu fitnatunin-qalaba `alā wajhihi khasirad dunyā wal-ākhirah ۚ dhālika huwal khusrānul mubīn

rows.arabic: يَدْعُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُۥ وَمَا لَا يَنفَعُهُۥ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلضَّلَـٰلُ ٱلْبَعِيدُ
rows.translation: He calleth, beside Allah, unto that which hurteth him not nor benefiteth him. That is the far error.
rows.transliteration: yad`ū min dūnillāhi mā lā yaḍurruhu wa mā lā yanfa`uh ۚ dhālika huwaḍ ḍalālul ba`īd

rows.arabic: يَدْعُوا۟ لَمَن ضَرُّهُۥٓ أَقْرَبُ مِن نَّفْعِهِۦ ۚ لَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَوْلَىٰ وَلَبِئْسَ ٱلْعَشِيرُ
rows.translation: He calleth unto him whose harm is nearer than his benefit; verily an evil patron and verily an evil friend!
rows.transliteration: yad`ū laman ḍarruhu aqrabu min naf`ih ۚ labi-sal mawlā walabi-sal `ashīr

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدْخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفْعَلُ مَا يُرِيدُ
rows.translation: Lo! Allah causeth those who believe and do good works to enter Gardens underneath which rivers flow. Lo! Allah doth what He intendeth.
rows.transliteration: innallāha yudkhilul ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār ۚ innallāha yaf`alu mā yurīd

rows.arabic: مَن كَانَ يَظُنُّ أَن لَّن يَنصُرَهُ ٱللَّهُ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ فَلْيَمْدُدْ بِسَبَبٍ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ ثُمَّ لْيَقْطَعْ فَلْيَنظُرْ هَلْ يُذْهِبَنَّ كَيْدُهُۥ مَا يَغِيظُ
rows.translation: Whoso is wont to think (through envy) that Allah will not give him (Muhammad) victory in the world and the Hereafter (and is enraged at the thought of his victory), let him stretch a rope up to the roof (of his dwelling), and let him hang himself. Then let him see whether his strategy dispelleth that whereat he rageth!.
rows.transliteration: man kāna yaẓunnu an lan yanṣurahullāhu fid dunyā wal-ākhirati falyamdud bisababin ilas samā-i thummalyaqṭa` falyanẓur hal yudh-hibanna kayduhu mā yaghīẓ

rows.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ ءَايَـٰتٍۭ بَيِّنَـٰتٍ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهْدِى مَن يُرِيدُ
rows.translation: Thus We reveal it as plain revelations, and verily Allah guideth whom He will.
rows.transliteration: wakadhālika anzalnāhu āyātin bayyinātin wa-annallāha yahdī man yurīd

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَٱلَّذِينَ هَادُوا۟ وَٱلصَّـٰبِـِٔينَ وَٱلنَّصَـٰرَىٰ وَٱلْمَجُوسَ وَٱلَّذِينَ أَشْرَكُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفْصِلُ بَيْنَهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
rows.translation: Lo! those who believe (this revelation), and those who are Jews, and the Sabaeans and the Christians and the Magians and the idolaters - Lo! Allah will decide between them on the Day of Resurrection. Lo! Allah is Witness over all things.
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna āmanū wal ladhīna hādū waṣ ṣābi-īna wan naṣārā wal majūsa wal ladhīna ashrakū innallāha yafṣilu baynahum yawmal qiyāmah ۚ innallāha `alā kulli shay-in shahīd

rows.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَسْجُدُ لَهُۥ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱلشَّمْسُ وَٱلْقَمَرُ وَٱلنُّجُومُ وَٱلْجِبَالُ وَٱلشَّجَرُ وَٱلدَّوَآبُّ وَكَثِيرٌ مِّنَ ٱلنَّاسِ ۖ وَكَثِيرٌ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ ٱلْعَذَابُ ۗ وَمَن يُهِنِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّكْرِمٍ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَفْعَلُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۩
rows.translation: Hast thou not seen that unto Allah payeth adoration whosoever is in the heavens and whosoever is in the earth, and the sun, and the moon, and the stars, and the hills, and the trees, and the beasts, and many of mankind, while there are many unto whom the doom is justly due. He whom Allah scorneth, there is none to give him honour. Lo! Allah doeth what He will.
rows.transliteration: alam tara annallāha yasjudu lahu man fis samāwāti wa man fil-arḍi wash shamsu wal qamaru wan nujūmu wal jibālu wash shajaru wad dawābbu wakathīrun minan nās ۖ wakathīrun ḥaqqa `alayhil `adhāb ۗ wa man yuhinillāhu famā lahu min mukrim ۚ innallāha yaf`alu mā yashā-u ۩

rows.arabic: هَـٰذَانِ خَصْمَانِ ٱخْتَصَمُوا۟ فِى رَبِّهِمْ ۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ قُطِّعَتْ لَهُمْ ثِيَابٌ مِّن نَّارٍ يُصَبُّ مِن فَوْقِ رُءُوسِهِمُ ٱلْحَمِيمُ
rows.translation: These twain (the believers and the disbelievers) are two opponents who contend concerning their Lord. But as for those who disbelieve, garments of fire will be cut out for them; boiling fluid will be poured down on their heads,
rows.transliteration: hādhāni khaṣmānikh-taṣamū fī rabbihim ۖ fal ladhīna kafarū quṭṭi`at lahum thiyābun min nāriy yuṣabbu min fawqi ru-ūsihimul ḥamīm

rows.arabic: يُصْهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِى بُطُونِهِمْ وَٱلْجُلُودُ
rows.translation: Whereby that which is in their bellies, and their skins too, will be melted;
rows.transliteration: yuṣ-haru bihi mā fī buṭūnihim wal julūd

rows.arabic: وَلَهُم مَّقَـٰمِعُ مِنْ حَدِيدٍ
rows.translation: And for them are hooked rods of iron.
rows.transliteration: walahum maqāmi`u min ḥadīd

rows.arabic: كُلَّمَآ أَرَادُوٓا۟ أَن يَخْرُجُوا۟ مِنْهَا مِنْ غَمٍّ أُعِيدُوا۟ فِيهَا وَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلْحَرِيقِ
rows.translation: Whenever, in their anguish, they would go forth from thence they are driven back therein and (it is said unto them): Taste the doom of burning.
rows.transliteration: kullamā arādū an yakhrujū minhā min ghammin u`īdū fīhā wadhūqū `adhābal ḥarīq

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدْخِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ جَنَّـٰتٍ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ يُحَلَّوْنَ فِيهَا مِنْ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٍ وَلُؤْلُؤًا ۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمْ فِيهَا حَرِيرٌ
rows.translation: Lo! Allah will cause those who believe and do good works to enter Gardens underneath which rivers flow, wherein they will be allowed armlets of gold, and pearls, and their raiment therein will be silk.
rows.transliteration: innallāha yudkhilul ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru yuḥallawna fīhā min asāwira min dhahabin walu-lu-ā ۖ walibāsuhum fīhā ḥarīr

rows.arabic: وَهُدُوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلْقَوْلِ وَهُدُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
rows.translation: They are guided unto gentle speech; they are guided unto the path of the Glorious One.
rows.transliteration: wahudū ilaṭ ṭayyibi minal qawli wahudū ilā ṣirāṭil ḥamīd

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلْمَسْجِدِ ٱلْحَرَامِ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلْنَـٰهُ لِلنَّاسِ سَوَآءً ٱلْعَـٰكِفُ فِيهِ وَٱلْبَادِ ۚ وَمَن يُرِدْ فِيهِ بِإِلْحَادٍۭ بِظُلْمٍ نُّذِقْهُ مِنْ عَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
rows.translation: Lo! those who disbelieve and bar (men) from the way of Allah and from the Inviolable Place of Worship, which We have appointed for mankind together, the dweller therein and the nomad: whosoever seeketh wrongful partiality therein, him We shall cause to taste a painful doom.
rows.transliteration: innal ladhīna kafarū wayaṣuddūna `an sabīlillāhi wal masjidil ḥarāmil ladhī ja`alnāhu linnāsi sawā-anil-`ākifu fīhi wal bād ۚ wa man yurid fīhi bi-ilḥādin biẓul-min nudhiqhu min `adhābin alīm

rows.arabic: وَإِذْ بَوَّأْنَا لِإِبْرَٰهِيمَ مَكَانَ ٱلْبَيْتِ أَن لَّا تُشْرِكْ بِى شَيْـًٔا وَطَهِّرْ بَيْتِىَ لِلطَّآئِفِينَ وَٱلْقَآئِمِينَ وَٱلرُّكَّعِ ٱلسُّجُودِ
rows.translation: And (remember) when We prepared for Abraham the place of the (holy) House, saying: Ascribe thou no thing as partner unto Me, and purify My House for those who make the round (thereof) and those who stand and those who bow and make prostration.
rows.transliteration: wa idh bawwa-nā li-ibrāhīma makānal bayti an lā tushrik bī shay-an waṭahhir baytiya liṭṭā-ifīna wal qā-imīna war rukka`is sujūd

rows.arabic: وَأَذِّن فِى ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَجِّ يَأْتُوكَ رِجَالًا وَعَلَىٰ كُلِّ ضَامِرٍ يَأْتِينَ مِن كُلِّ فَجٍّ عَمِيقٍ
rows.translation: And proclaim unto mankind the pilgrimage. They will come unto thee on foot and on every lean camel; they will come from every deep ravine,
rows.transliteration: wa-adhhin fin nāsi bil ḥajji ya-tūka rijālan wa`alā kulli ḍāmiriy ya-tīna min kulli fajjin `amīq

rows.arabic: لِّيَشْهَدُوا۟ مَنَـٰفِعَ لَهُمْ وَيَذْكُرُوا۟ ٱسْمَ ٱللَّهِ فِىٓ أَيَّامٍ مَّعْلُومَـٰتٍ عَلَىٰ مَا رَزَقَهُم مِّنۢ بَهِيمَةِ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ۖ فَكُلُوا۟ مِنْهَا وَأَطْعِمُوا۟ ٱلْبَآئِسَ ٱلْفَقِيرَ
rows.translation: That they may witness things that are of benefit to them, and mention the name of Allah on appointed days over the beast of cattle that He hath bestowed upon them. Then eat thereof and feed therewith the poor unfortunate.
rows.transliteration: liyash-hadū manāfi`a lahum wayadhkurus-mallāhi fī ayyāmin ma`lūmātin `alā mā razaqahum min bahīmatil-an`ām ۖ fakulū minhā wa-aṭ`imul bā-isal faqīr

rows.arabic: ثُمَّ لْيَقْضُوا۟ تَفَثَهُمْ وَلْيُوفُوا۟ نُذُورَهُمْ وَلْيَطَّوَّفُوا۟ بِٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْعَتِيقِ
rows.translation: Then let them make an end of their unkemptness and pay their vows and go around the ancient House.
rows.transliteration: thummalyaqḍū tafathahum walūfū nudhūrahum walyaṭṭawwafū bil baytil `atīq

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ وَمَن يُعَظِّمْ حُرُمَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَهُوَ خَيْرٌ لَّهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦ ۗ وَأُحِلَّتْ لَكُمُ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمُ إِلَّا مَا يُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَٱجْتَنِبُوا۟ ٱلرِّجْسَ مِنَ ٱلْأَوْثَـٰنِ وَٱجْتَنِبُوا۟ قَوْلَ ٱلزُّورِ
rows.translation: That (is the command). And whoso magnifieth the sacred things of Allah, it will be well for him in the sight of his Lord. The cattle are lawful unto you save that which hath been told you. So shun the filth of idols, and shun lying speech,
rows.transliteration: dhālika wa man yu`aẓẓim ḥurumātillāhi fahuwa khayrul lahu `inda rabbih ۗ wa-uḥillat lakumul-an`āmu illā mā yutlā `alaykum ۖ fajtanibur rijsa minal-awthāni wajtanibū qawlaz zūr

rows.arabic: حُنَفَآءَ لِلَّهِ غَيْرَ مُشْرِكِينَ بِهِۦ ۚ وَمَن يُشْرِكْ بِٱللَّهِ فَكَأَنَّمَا خَرَّ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَتَخْطَفُهُ ٱلطَّيْرُ أَوْ تَهْوِى بِهِ ٱلرِّيحُ فِى مَكَانٍ سَحِيقٍ
rows.translation: Turning unto Allah (only), not ascribing partners unto Him; for whoso ascribeth partners unto Allah, it is as if he had fallen from the sky and the birds had snatched him or the wind had blown him to a far-off place.
rows.transliteration: ḥunafā-a lillāhi ghayra mushrikīna bih ۚ wa man yushrik billāhi faka-annamā kharra minas samā-i fatakhṭafuhuṭ ṭayru aw tahwy bihir rīḥu fī makānin saḥīq

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ وَمَن يُعَظِّمْ شَعَـٰٓئِرَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّهَا مِن تَقْوَى ٱلْقُلُوبِ
rows.translation: That (is the command). And whoso magnifieth the offerings consecrated to Allah, it surely is from devotion of the hearts,
rows.transliteration: dhālika wa man yu`aẓẓim sha`ā-irallāhi fa-innahā min taqwal qulūb

rows.arabic: لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَنَـٰفِعُ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍ مُّسَمًّى ثُمَّ مَحِلُّهَآ إِلَى ٱلْبَيْتِ ٱلْعَتِيقِ
rows.translation: Therein are benefits for you for an appointed term; and afterward they are brought for sacrifice unto the ancient House.
rows.transliteration: lakum fīhā manāfi`u ilā ajalin musamman thumma maḥilluhā ilal-baytil `atīq

rows.arabic: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ جَعَلْنَا مَنسَكًا لِّيَذْكُرُوا۟ ٱسْمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَىٰ مَا رَزَقَهُم مِّنۢ بَهِيمَةِ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ ۗ فَإِلَـٰهُكُمْ إِلَـٰهٌ وَٰحِدٌ فَلَهُۥٓ أَسْلِمُوا۟ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُخْبِتِينَ
rows.translation: And for every nation have We appointed a ritual, that they may mention the name of Allah over the beast of cattle that He hath given them for food; and your god is One God, therefor surrender unto Him. And give good tidings (O Muhammad) to the humble,
rows.transliteration: walikulli ummatin ja`alnā mansakal liyadhkurus-mallāhi `alā mā razaqahum min bahīmatil-an`ām ۗ fa-ilāhukum ilāhun wāḥidun falahu aslimū ۗ wabashhiril mukhbitīn

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ ٱللَّهُ وَجِلَتْ قُلُوبُهُمْ وَٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَصَابَهُمْ وَٱلْمُقِيمِى ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
rows.translation: Whose hearts fear when Allah is mentioned, and the patient of whatever may befall them, and those who establish worship and who spend of that We have bestowed on them.
rows.transliteration: alladhīna idhā dhukirallāhu wajilat qulūbuhum waṣ ṣābirīna `alā mā aṣābahum wal muqīmiṣ ṣalāti wa mimmā razaqnāhum yunfiqūn

rows.arabic: وَٱلْبُدْنَ جَعَلْنَـٰهَا لَكُم مِّن شَعَـٰٓئِرِ ٱللَّهِ لَكُمْ فِيهَا خَيْرٌ ۖ فَٱذْكُرُوا۟ ٱسْمَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْهَا صَوَآفَّ ۖ فَإِذَا وَجَبَتْ جُنُوبُهَا فَكُلُوا۟ مِنْهَا وَأَطْعِمُوا۟ ٱلْقَانِعَ وَٱلْمُعْتَرَّ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ سَخَّرْنَـٰهَا لَكُمْ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَشْكُرُونَ
rows.translation: And the camels! We have appointed them among the ceremonies of Allah. Therein ye have much good. So mention the name of Allah over them when they are drawn up in lines. Then when their flanks fall (dead), eat thereof and feed the beggar and the suppliant. Thus have We made them subject unto you, that haply ye may give thanks.
rows.transliteration: wal budna ja`alnāhā lakum min sha`ā-irillāhi lakum fīhā khayr ۖ fadhkurus-mallāhi `alayhā ṣawāff ۖ fa-idhā wajabat junūbuhā fakulū minhā wa-aṭ`imul qāni`a wal mu`tarr ۚ kadhālika sakhharnāhā lakum la`allakum tashkurūn

rows.arabic: لَن يَنَالَ ٱللَّهَ لُحُومُهَا وَلَا دِمَآؤُهَا وَلَـٰكِن يَنَالُهُ ٱلتَّقْوَىٰ مِنكُمْ ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ سَخَّرَهَا لَكُمْ لِتُكَبِّرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا هَدَىٰكُمْ ۗ وَبَشِّرِ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
rows.translation: Their flesh and their food reach not Allah, but the devotion from you reacheth Him. Thus have We made them subject unto you that ye may magnify Allah that He hath guided you. And give good tidings (O Muhammad) to the good.
rows.transliteration: lan yanālallāha luḥūmuhā walā dimā-uhā walākin yanāluhut taqwā minkum ۚ kadhālika sakhharahā lakum litukabbirullāha `alā mā hadākum ۗ wabashhiril muḥsinīn

rows.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُدَٰفِعُ عَنِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ خَوَّانٍ كَفُورٍ
rows.translation: Lo! Allah defendeth those who are true. Lo! Allah loveth not each treacherous ingrate.
rows.transliteration: innallāha yudāfi`u `anil ladhīna āmanū ۗ innallāha lā yuḥibbu kulla khawwānin kafūr

rows.arabic: أُذِنَ لِلَّذِينَ يُقَـٰتَلُونَ بِأَنَّهُمْ ظُلِمُوا۟ ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ نَصْرِهِمْ لَقَدِيرٌ
rows.translation: Sanction is given unto those who fight because they have been wronged; and Allah is indeed Able to give them victory;
rows.transliteration: udhina lilladhīna yuqātalūna bi-annahum ẓulimū ۚ wa innallāha `alā naṣrihim laqadīr

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ أُخْرِجُوا۟ مِن دِيَـٰرِهِم بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّ إِلَّآ أَن يَقُولُوا۟ رَبُّنَا ٱللَّهُ ۗ وَلَوْلَا دَفْعُ ٱللَّهِ ٱلنَّاسَ بَعْضَهُم بِبَعْضٍ لَّهُدِّمَتْ صَوَٰمِعُ وَبِيَعٌ وَصَلَوَٰتٌ وَمَسَـٰجِدُ يُذْكَرُ فِيهَا ٱسْمُ ٱللَّهِ كَثِيرًا ۗ وَلَيَنصُرَنَّ ٱللَّهُ مَن يَنصُرُهُۥٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌ
rows.translation: Those who have been driven from their homes unjustly only because they said: Our Lord is Allah - For had it not been for Allah's repelling some men by means of others, cloisters and churches and oratories and mosques, wherein the name of Allah is oft mentioned, would assuredly have been pulled down. Verily Allah helpeth one who helpeth Him. Lo! Allah is Strong, Almighty -
rows.transliteration: alladhīna ukhrijū min diyārihim bighayri ḥaqqin illā an yaqūlū rabbunallāh ۗ walawlā daf`ullāhin nāsa ba`ḍahum biba`ḍin lahuddimat ṣawāmi`u wabiya`un waṣalawātun wa masājidu yudhkaru fīhas-mullāhi kathīrā ۗ walayanṣurannallāhu man yanṣuruh ۗ innallāha laqawiyyun `azīz

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِن مَّكَّنَّـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتَوُا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَأَمَرُوا۟ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ وَنَهَوْا۟ عَنِ ٱلْمُنكَرِ ۗ وَلِلَّهِ عَـٰقِبَةُ ٱلْأُمُورِ
rows.translation: Those who, if We give them power in the land, establish worship and pay the poor-due and enjoin kindness and forbid iniquity. And Allah's is the sequel of events.
rows.transliteration: alladhīna in makkannāhum fil-arḍi aqāmuṣ ṣalāta wa-ātawuz zakāta wa-amarū bil ma`rūfi wanahaw `anil munkar ۗ walillāhi `āqibatul-umūr

rows.arabic: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَثَمُودُ
rows.translation: If they deny thee (Muhammad), even so the folk of Noah, and (the tribes of) A'ad and Thamud, before thee, denied (Our messengers);
rows.transliteration: wa in yukadhhibūka faqad kadhhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin wa`ādun wathamūd

rows.arabic: وَقَوْمُ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ
rows.translation: And the folk of Abraham and the folk of Lot;
rows.transliteration: waqawmu ibrāhīma waqawmu lūṭ

rows.arabic: وَأَصْحَـٰبُ مَدْيَنَ ۖ وَكُذِّبَ مُوسَىٰ فَأَمْلَيْتُ لِلْكَـٰفِرِينَ ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُهُمْ ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
rows.translation: (And) the dwellers in Midian. And Moses was denied; but I indulged the disbelievers a long while, then I seized them, and how (terrible) was My abhorrence!
rows.transliteration: wa-aṣ-ḥābu madyan ۖ wakudhhiba mūsā fa-amlaytu lilkāfirīna thumma akhadhtuhum ۖ fakayfa kāna nakīr

rows.arabic: فَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَهْلَكْنَـٰهَا وَهِىَ ظَالِمَةٌ فَهِىَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَبِئْرٍ مُّعَطَّلَةٍ وَقَصْرٍ مَّشِيدٍ
rows.translation: How many a township have We destroyed while it was sinful, so that it lieth (to this day) in ruins, and (how many) a deserted well and lofty tower!
rows.transliteration: faka-ayyin min qaryatin ahlaknāhā wahiya ẓālimatun fahiya khāwiyatun `alā `urūshihā wabi-rin mu`aṭṭalatin waqaṣrin mashīd

rows.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَسِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَتَكُونَ لَهُمْ قُلُوبٌ يَعْقِلُونَ بِهَآ أَوْ ءَاذَانٌ يَسْمَعُونَ بِهَا ۖ فَإِنَّهَا لَا تَعْمَى ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ وَلَـٰكِن تَعْمَى ٱلْقُلُوبُ ٱلَّتِى فِى ٱلصُّدُورِ
rows.translation: Have they not travelled in the land, and have they hearts wherewith to feel and ears wherewith to hear? For indeed it is not the eyes that grow blind, but it is the hearts, which are within the bosoms, that grow blind.
rows.transliteration: afalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fatakūna lahum qulūbun ya`qilūna bihā aw ādhānun yasma`ūna bihā ۖ fa-innahā lā ta`mal-abṣāru walākin ta`mal qulūbul latī fiṣ ṣudūr

rows.arabic: وَيَسْتَعْجِلُونَكَ بِٱلْعَذَابِ وَلَن يُخْلِفَ ٱللَّهُ وَعْدَهُۥ ۚ وَإِنَّ يَوْمًا عِندَ رَبِّكَ كَأَلْفِ سَنَةٍ مِّمَّا تَعُدُّونَ
rows.translation: And they will bid thee hasten on the Doom, and Allah faileth not His promise, but lo! a Day with Allah is as a thousand years of what ye reckon.
rows.transliteration: wayasta`jilūnaka bil `adhābi walan yukhlifallāhu wa`dah ۚ wa inna yawman `inda rabbika ka-alfi sanatim mimmā ta`uddūn

rows.arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن قَرْيَةٍ أَمْلَيْتُ لَهَا وَهِىَ ظَالِمَةٌ ثُمَّ أَخَذْتُهَا وَإِلَىَّ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
rows.translation: And how many a township did I suffer long though it was sinful! Then I grasped it. Unto Me is the return.
rows.transliteration: waka-ayyin min qaryatin amlaytu lahā wahiya ẓālimatun thumma akhadhtuhā wa ilayyal maṣīr

rows.arabic: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
rows.translation: Say: O mankind! I am only a plain warner unto you.
rows.transliteration: qul yā-ayyuhan nāsu innamā ana lakum nadhīrun mubīn

rows.arabic: فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَرِزْقٌ كَرِيمٌ
rows.translation: Those who believe and do good works, for them is pardon and a rich provision;
rows.transliteration: fal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun warizqun karīm

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوْا۟ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا مُعَـٰجِزِينَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ
rows.translation: While those who strive to thwart Our revelations, such are rightful owners of the Fire.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna sa`aw fī āyātinā mu`ājizīna ulā-ika aṣ-ḥābul jaḥīm

rows.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ مِن رَّسُولٍ وَلَا نَبِىٍّ إِلَّآ إِذَا تَمَنَّىٰٓ أَلْقَى ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فِىٓ أُمْنِيَّتِهِۦ فَيَنسَخُ ٱللَّهُ مَا يُلْقِى ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ ثُمَّ يُحْكِمُ ٱللَّهُ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ
rows.translation: Never sent We a messenger or a prophet before thee but when He recited (the message) Satan proposed (opposition) in respect of that which he recited thereof. But Allah abolisheth that which Satan proposeth. Then Allah establisheth His revelations. Allah is Knower, Wise;
rows.transliteration: wa mā arsalnā min qablika min rasūlin walā nabiyyin illā idhā tamannā alqash shayṭānu fī umniyyatihi fayansakhullāhu mā yulqish shayṭānu thumma yuḥkimullāhu āyātih ۗ wallāhu `alīmun ḥakīm

rows.arabic: لِّيَجْعَلَ مَا يُلْقِى ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَٱلْقَاسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ لَفِى شِقَاقٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
rows.translation: That He may make that which the devil proposeth a temptation for those in whose hearts is a disease, and those whose hearts are hardened - Lo! the evil-doers are in open schism -
rows.transliteration: liyaj`ala mā yulqish shayṭānu fitnatan lilladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun wal qāsiyati qulūbuhum ۗ wa innaẓ ẓālimīna lafī shiqāqin ba`īd

rows.arabic: وَلِيَعْلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمَ أَنَّهُ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَيُؤْمِنُوا۟ بِهِۦ فَتُخْبِتَ لَهُۥ قُلُوبُهُمْ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهَادِ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
rows.translation: And that those who have been given knowledge may know that it is the truth from thy Lord, so that they may believe therein and their hearts may submit humbly unto Him. Lo! Allah verily is guiding those who believe unto a right path.
rows.transliteration: waliya`lamal ladhīna ūtul `il-ma annahul ḥaqqu min rabbika fayu-minū bihi fatukhbita lahu qulūbuhum ۗ wa innallāha lahādil ladhīna āmanū ilā ṣirāṭin mustaqīm

rows.arabic: وَلَا يَزَالُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى مِرْيَةٍ مِّنْهُ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغْتَةً أَوْ يَأْتِيَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَقِيمٍ
rows.translation: And those who disbelieve will not cease to be in doubt thereof until the Hour come upon them unawares, or there come unto them the doom of a disastrous day.
rows.transliteration: walā yazālul ladhīna kafarū fī miryatim minhu ḥattā ta-tiyahumus sā`atu baghtatan aw ya-tiyahum `adhābu yawmin `aqīm

rows.arabic: ٱلْمُلْكُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فِى جَنَّـٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
rows.translation: The Sovereignty on that day will be Allah's, He will judge between them. Then those who believed and did good works will be in Gardens of Delight,
rows.transliteration: al-mulku yawma-idhin lillāhi yaḥkumu baynahum ۚ fal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti fī jannātin na`īm

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مُّهِينٌ
rows.translation: While those who disbelieved and denied Our revelations, for them will be a shameful doom.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna kafarū wakadhhabū bi-āyātinā fa-ulā-ika lahum `adhābun muhīn

rows.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُوا۟ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ قُتِلُوٓا۟ أَوْ مَاتُوا۟ لَيَرْزُقَنَّهُمُ ٱللَّهُ رِزْقًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
rows.translation: Those who fled their homes for the cause of Allah and then were slain or died, Allah verily will provide for them a good provision. Lo! Allah, He verily is Best of all who make provision.
rows.transliteration: wal ladhīna hājarū fī sabīlillāhi thumma qutilū aw mātū layarzuqannahumullāhu rizqan ḥasanā ۚ wa innallāha lahuwa khayrur rāziqīn

rows.arabic: لَيُدْخِلَنَّهُم مُّدْخَلًا يَرْضَوْنَهُۥ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَلِيمٌ
rows.translation: Assuredly He will cause them to enter by an entry that they will love. Lo! Allah verily is Knower, Indulgent.
rows.transliteration: layudkhilannahum mudkhalan yarḍawnah ۗ wa innallāha la`alīmun ḥalīm

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ وَمَنْ عَاقَبَ بِمِثْلِ مَا عُوقِبَ بِهِۦ ثُمَّ بُغِىَ عَلَيْهِ لَيَنصُرَنَّهُ ٱللَّهُ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَفُورٌ
rows.translation: That (is so). And whoso hath retaliated with the like of that which he was made to suffer and then hath (again) been wronged, Allah will succour him. Lo! Allah verily is Mild, Forgiving.
rows.transliteration: dhālika wa man `āqaba bimithli mā `ūqiba bihi thumma bughiya `alayhi layanṣurannahullāh ۗ innallāha la`afuwwun ghafūr

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُولِجُ ٱلَّيْلَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِى ٱلَّيْلِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۢ بَصِيرٌ
rows.translation: That is because Allah maketh the night to pass into the day and maketh the day to pass into the night, and because Allah is Hearer, Seer.
rows.transliteration: dhālika bi-annallāha yūlijul layla fin nahāri wayūlijun nahāra fil layli wa-annallāha samī`un baṣīr

rows.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَأَنَّ مَا يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ هُوَ ٱلْبَـٰطِلُ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
rows.translation: That is because Allah, He is the True, and that whereon they call instead of Him, it is the false, and because Allah, He is the High, the Great.
rows.transliteration: dhālika bi-annallāha huwal ḥaqqu wa-anna mā yad`ūna min dūnihi huwal bāṭilu wa-annallāha huwal `aliyyul kabīr

rows.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَتُصْبِحُ ٱلْأَرْضُ مُخْضَرَّةً ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَبِيرٌ
rows.translation: Seest thou not how Allah sendeth down water from the sky and then the earth becometh green upon the morrow? Lo! Allah is Subtile, Aware.
rows.transliteration: alam tara annallāha anzala minas samā-i mā-an fatuṣbiḥul-arḍu mukhḍarrah ۗ innallāha laṭīfun khabīr

rows.arabic: لَّهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلْغَنِىُّ ٱلْحَمِيدُ
rows.translation: Unto Him belongeth all that is in the heavens and all that is in the earth. Lo! Allah, He verily is the Absolute, the Owner of Praise.
rows.transliteration: lahu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۗ wa innallāha lahuwal ghaniyyul ḥamīd

rows.arabic: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَٱلْفُلْكَ تَجْرِى فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ بِأَمْرِهِۦ وَيُمْسِكُ ٱلسَّمَآءَ أَن تَقَعَ عَلَى ٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِٱلنَّاسِ لَرَءُوفٌ رَّحِيمٌ
rows.translation: Hast thou not seen how Allah hath made all that is in the earth subservient unto you? And the ship runneth upon the sea by His command, and He holdeth back the heaven from falling on the earth unless by His leave. Lo! Allah is, for mankind, Full of Pity, Merciful.
rows.transliteration: alam tara annallāha sakhhara lakum mā fil-arḍi wal fulka tajrī fil baḥri bi-amrihi wayumsikus samā-a an taqa`a `alal-arḍi illā bi-idhnih ۗ innallāha bin nāsi lara-ūfun raḥīm

rows.arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَحْيَاكُمْ ثُمَّ يُمِيتُكُمْ ثُمَّ يُحْيِيكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ لَكَفُورٌ
rows.translation: And He it is Who gave you life, then He will cause you to die, and then will give you life (again). Lo! man is verily an ingrate.
rows.transliteration: wahuwal ladhī aḥyākum thumma yumītukum thumma yuḥyīkum ۗ innal-insāna lakafūr

rows.arabic: لِّكُلِّ أُمَّةٍ جَعَلْنَا مَنسَكًا هُمْ نَاسِكُوهُ ۖ فَلَا يُنَـٰزِعُنَّكَ فِى ٱلْأَمْرِ ۚ وَٱدْعُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ ۖ إِنَّكَ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًى مُّسْتَقِيمٍ
rows.translation: Unto each nation have We given sacred rites which they are to perform; so let them not dispute with thee of the matter, but summon thou unto thy Lord. Lo! thou indeed followest right guidance.
rows.transliteration: likulli ummatin ja`alnā mansakan hum nāsikūh ۖ falā yunāzi`unnaka fil-amr ۚ wad`u ilā rabbik ۖ innaka la`alā hudan mustaqīm

rows.arabic: وَإِن جَـٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
rows.translation: And if they wrangle with thee, say: Allah is Best Aware of what ye do.
rows.transliteration: wa in jādalūka faqulillāhu a`lamu bimā ta`malūn

rows.arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَكُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فِيمَا كُنتُمْ فِيهِ تَخْتَلِفُونَ
rows.translation: Allah will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that wherein ye used to differ.
rows.transliteration: allāhu yaḥkumu baynakum yawmal qiyāmati fīmā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūn

rows.arabic: أَلَمْ تَعْلَمْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ فِى كِتَـٰبٍ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
rows.translation: Hast thou not known that Allah knoweth all that is in the heaven and the earth? Lo! it is in a record. Lo! that is easy for Allah.
rows.transliteration: alam ta`lam annallāha ya`lamu mā fis samā-i wal-arḍ ۗ inna dhālika fī kitāb ۚ inna dhālika `alallāhi yasīr

rows.arabic: وَيَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يُنَزِّلْ بِهِۦ سُلْطَـٰنًا وَمَا لَيْسَ لَهُم بِهِۦ عِلْمٌ ۗ وَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ
rows.translation: And they worship instead of Allah that for which He hath sent down no warrant, and that whereof they have no knowledge. For evil-doers there is no helper.
rows.transliteration: waya`budūna min dūnillāhi mā lam yunazzil bihi sulṭānan wa mā laysa lahum bihi `il-m ۗ wa mā liẓẓālimīna min naṣīr

rows.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍ تَعْرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ٱلْمُنكَرَ ۖ يَكَادُونَ يَسْطُونَ بِٱلَّذِينَ يَتْلُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا ۗ قُلْ أَفَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِشَرٍّ مِّن ذَٰلِكُمُ ۗ ٱلنَّارُ وَعَدَهَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۖ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
rows.translation: And when Our revelations are recited unto them, thou knowest the denial in the faces of those who disbelieve; they all but attack those who recite Our revelations unto them. Say: Shall I proclaim unto you worse than that? The Fire! Allah hath promised it for those who disbelieve. A hapless journey's end!
rows.transliteration: wa idhā tutlā `alayhim āyātunā bayyinātin ta`rifu fī wujūhil ladhīna kafarul munkar ۖ yakādūna yasṭūna bil ladhīna yatlūna `alayhim āyātinā ۗ qul afa-unabbi-ukum bisharrin min dhālikum ۗ an-nāru wa`adahallāhul ladhīna kafarū ۖ wabi-sal maṣīr

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ضُرِبَ مَثَلٌ فَٱسْتَمِعُوا۟ لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَن يَخْلُقُوا۟ ذُبَابًا وَلَوِ ٱجْتَمَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ ۖ وَإِن يَسْلُبْهُمُ ٱلذُّبَابُ شَيْـًٔا لَّا يَسْتَنقِذُوهُ مِنْهُ ۚ ضَعُفَ ٱلطَّالِبُ وَٱلْمَطْلُوبُ
rows.translation: O mankind! A similitude is coined, so pay ye heed to it: Lo! those on whom ye call beside Allah will never create a fly though they combine together for the purpose. And if the fly took something from them, they could not rescue it from it. So weak are (both) the seeker and the sought!
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhan nāsu ḍuriba mathalun fastami`ū lah ۚ innal ladhīna tad`ūna min dūnillāhi lan yakhluqū dhubāban walawij-tama`ū lah ۖ wa in yaslubhumudh dhubābu shay-al lā yastanqidhūhu minh ۚ ḍa`ufaṭ ṭālibu wal maṭlūb

rows.arabic: مَا قَدَرُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِۦٓ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِىٌّ عَزِيزٌ
rows.translation: They measure not Allah His rightful measure. Lo! Allah is Strong, Almighty.
rows.transliteration: mā qadarullāha ḥaqqa qadrih ۗ innallāha laqawiyyun `azīz

rows.arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَصْطَفِى مِنَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلًا وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌۢ بَصِيرٌ
rows.translation: Allah chooseth from the angels messengers, and (also) from mankind. Lo! Allah is Hearer, Seer.
rows.transliteration: allāhu yaṣṭafī minal malā-ikati rusulan wa minan nās ۚ innallāha samī`un baṣīr

rows.arabic: يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ ۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرْجَعُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
rows.translation: He knoweth all that is before them and all that is behind them, and unto Allah all things are returned. $$A
rows.transliteration: ya`lamu mā bayna aydīhim wa mā khalfahum ۗ wa ilallāhi turja`ul-umūr

rows.arabic: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ وَٱسْجُدُوا۟ وَٱعْبُدُوا۟ رَبَّكُمْ وَٱفْعَلُوا۟ ٱلْخَيْرَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُفْلِحُونَ ۩
rows.translation: O ye who believe! Bow down and prostrate yourselves, and worship your Lord, and do good, that haply ye may prosper.
rows.transliteration: yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanur-ka`ū wasjudū wa`budū rabbakum wāf`alul khayra la`allakum tufliḥūn ۩

rows.arabic: وَجَـٰهِدُوا۟ فِى ٱللَّهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِهِۦ ۚ هُوَ ٱجْتَبَىٰكُمْ وَمَا جَعَلَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِى ٱلدِّينِ مِنْ حَرَجٍ ۚ مِّلَّةَ أَبِيكُمْ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ۚ هُوَ سَمَّىٰكُمُ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ مِن قَبْلُ وَفِى هَـٰذَا لِيَكُونَ ٱلرَّسُولُ شَهِيدًا عَلَيْكُمْ وَتَكُونُوا۟ شُهَدَآءَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ ۚ فَأَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُوا۟ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱعْتَصِمُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ هُوَ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ ۖ فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَوْلَىٰ وَنِعْمَ ٱلنَّصِيرُ
rows.translation: And strive for Allah with the endeavour which is His right. He hath chosen you and hath not laid upon you in religion any hardship; the faith of your father Abraham (is yours). He hath named you Muslims of old time and in this (Scripture), that the messenger may be a witness against you, and that ye may be witnesses against mankind. So establish worship, pay the poor-due, and hold fast to Allah. He is your Protecting friend. A blessed Patron and a blessed Helper!
